mapper.select: SELECT QA_NUM, ROOT, QA_WRITER, QA_CONTENT, QA_TITLE, QA_REGDATE, QA_UPDATEDATE, STEP, INDENT FROM ( SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC(QA_TBL PK_QA_NUM) */ rownum rn, QA_NUM, ROOT, QA_WRITER, QA_CONTENT, QA_TITLE, QA_REGDATE, QA_UPDATEDATE, STEP, INDENT FROM QA_TBL START WITH QA_NUM IN (SELECT DISTINCT ROOT FROM QA_TBL WHERE ROOT IS NOT NULL) CONNECT BY NOCYCLE PRIOR QA_NUM = ROOT ORDER SIBLINGS BY STEP ASC ) WHERE rn <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} AND rn > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}
